00011 #include "drive.h"

00014 uint8_t drive(uint8_t speed){
00015         uint8_t out = drive_front_free;
00016 
00017         copro_update();
00018         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00019 
00020         if(drive_isFrontFree()){
00021                 copro_setSpeed(speed,speed);
00022         }else{
00023                 copro_stop();
00024                 out = drive_direction_blocked;
00025         }
00026         delay(100);
00027         drive_sendTicks();
00028         drive_sendIRDistance(0);
00029         return out;
00030 }
00031 
00032 void drive_turn_left(){
00033         copro_setTargetRel(-27, 27, 10);
00034         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_left);
00035         drive_sendIRDistance(2000);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void drive_turn_halfLeft(){
00039         copro_setTargetRel(-13, 13, 10);
00040         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfLeft);
00041         drive_sendIRDistance(2000);
00042 }

00044 void drive_turn_right(){
00045         copro_setTargetRel(27, -27, 10);
00046         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_right);
00047         drive_sendIRDistance(2000);
00048 }

00052         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfRight);

00056 void drive_turn_around(){
00057         copro_setTargetRel(53, -53, 10);
00058         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_turn);
00059         drive_sendIRDistance(4000);

00064 uint8_t drive_getFreePath(){
00065 
00066         copro_update();
00067 
00068         if(drive_isFrontFree()){
00069                 return drive_front_free;
00070         }
00071         else if(drive_isRightFree()){
00072                 return drive_right_free;
00073         }
00074         else if(drive_isLeftFree()){
00075                 return drive_left_free;
00076         }
00077         else{
00078                 return drive_all_blocked;
00079         }
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 uint8_t drive_isFrontFree(){
00085         if (copro_distance[1]/256 < irAbstand &&
00086                 copro_distance[2]/256 < irAbstand &&
00087                 copro_distance[3]/256 < irAbstand){
00088                 return drive_front_free;
00089         }
00090         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00091 }
00092 
00093 uint8_t drive_isRightFree(){
00094         if (copro_distance[0] / 256 < irAbstand && copro_distance[1] / 256 < irAbstand){
00095                                 return drive_right_free;
00096         }
00097         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00098 }
00099 
00100 uint8_t drive_isLeftFree(){
00101         if (copro_distance[4] / 256 < irAbstand && copro_distance[3] / 256 < irAbstand){
00102                 return drive_left_free;
00103         }
00104         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void drive_sendTicks(){
00108         copro_update();
00109 
00110         if(copro_ticks_l > 0){
00111                 niboCom_putDistance(copro_ticks_l);
00112         }
00113         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void drive_sendIRDistance(int ms){
00117         delay(ms);
00118         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00119         copro_update();
00120         niboCom_putIRDistance(copro_distance);
00121 }
